txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Broken wooden spears found on the Orcs deep in the valley to the east of Trestlebridge. Deliver the items to Guardsman Otley in the town of Trestlebridge.
'We'll drive these Orcs away from our land and take back all the North Downs. These spears will serve as a rallying cry to gather our forces to drive the Orcs back. Thank you.'
'To the east, deep in the valley of Nan Wathren, the Orcs grow stronger. Hunt their number and collect their wooden spears so we can hearten the people here.'
Men of Bree Task: Broken Wooden Spears
Guardsman Otley, in Trestlebridge, is awaiting delivery of broken wooden spears at the war-torn town of Trestlebridge.
Deliver the broken wooden spears to Guardsman Otley at Trestlebridge
You have been tasked with collecting broken wooden spears from the Orcs found deep in the valley to the east of Trestlebridge. You can deliver the items to Guardsman Otley at Trestlebridge.
Wanted: Broken wooden spears found on the Orcs deep in the valley to the east of Trestlebridge.
